job.name: FwdTracking
job.command:
echo "JOBINDEX = ${JOBINDEX}" echo "JOBID = ${JOBID}" ln -s StRoot/StFwdTrackMaker/macro/daq/ daq ls -lah
setup 64b starver dev module use /cvmfs/star.sdcc.bnl.gov/star-spack/spack/share/spack/modules/linux-rhel7-x86_64/ module load star-env-root-5.34.38 module load kitrack-root-5.34.38 module load genfit-root-5.34.38 module load rave-2020-08-11
root4star -b -q -l 'daq/daq_track.C( 2, "'$INPUTFILE0'" )'
mv daq.root job_${JOBID}_daq.root mv fwdtree.root job_${JOBID}_fwdtree.root
